scopes.name: preamble
scopes.explanation: The preamble of the CSA typically includes the title, reference to the ISDA Master Agreement, the date, the parties, and the statement that the annex supplements the agreement. Lines 2-8 cover these elements, ending before the substantive terms begin.

scopes.name: Annex
scopes.explanation: The Annex of a New York law CSA begins at Paragraph 13 (line 10: 'Paragraph 13. Elections and Variables') and continues through the negotiated terms, ending at the signature block (line 203: '[Signature Page Follows]'). This matches the standard structure for the negotiated terms of the CSA under New York law.
